document.docAuthor: Pohl, Greg, Anweiler, Gary, Schmidt, Christian & Kondla, Norbert
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated list of the Lepidoptera of Alberta, Canada

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated list of the Lepidoptera of Alberta, Canada

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Northern Forestry Centre, Natural Resources Canada, Edmonton ,, Canada
University of Alberta Strickland Entomology Museum ,, Canada
Canadian Food Inspection Agency, Ottawa, Canada

subSubSection.paragraph:
1162 M
Euptoieta claudia (Cramer, 1775) Jul
– Aug m b G Variegated Fritillary
L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: CNC, OLDS, PMAE,
UASM

1163 * R H
Boloria alaskensis
( Holland , 1900) Jul – E aug M – – Alaskan Fritillary

Kosterin (2000) , Tuzov (2000) , Gorbunov (2001)
L: Bird et al. (1995) , Layberry et al. (1998) , Guppy
and Shepard (2001) C: UASM

UASM
